title: About racist
body:
Hi,
I'm here to let everybody know that there are 2 guys who intentionally feed then pretending they are Chinese whereas they are not. 

This was happened in Oceania server.

At the post-game chat they kept verbally abusing another player on their team and tried to translate "trash player" into Chinese language "垃圾播放器", but actually in English it means "trash music/video player", which is so obvious it was google translated. [](https://translate.google.com/#zh-CN/en/%E6%92%AD%E6%94%BE%E5%99%A8)[](https://translate.google.com/#en/zh-CN/player)

https://translate.google.com/#en/zh-CN/player

https://translate.google.com/#zh-CN/en/%E6%92%AD%E6%94%BE%E5%99%A8
One is called "**[REMOVED]**", and the other one is called "**[REMOVED]**".


If you met these guys please keep calm and don't waste your time arguing with them, really not worth it.

replies.body: Remove their names before an admin does. Naming and shaming against rules
